cards.name: Deceiver of Form
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, reveal the top card of your library. If a creature card is revealed this way, you may have creatures you control other than Deceiver of Form become copies of that card until end of turn. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.

cards.flavor: It is consistently inconsistent.
cards.name: Eldrazi Mimic
cards.text: Whenever another colorless creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may change Eldrazi Mimic's base power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Endbringer
cards.text:
Untap Endbringer during each other player's untap step.
{T}: Endbringer deals 1 damage to any target.
{C}, {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
{C}{C}, {T}: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: A void as cryptic as reality itself.
cards.name: Kozilek, the Great Distortion
cards.text:
When you cast this spell, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.
Menace
Discard a card with converted mana cost X: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.

cards.flavor:
"We didn't know where it came from or where it was going. All we knew was that we did not matter."
—Akiri, kor line-slinger
cards.name: Kozilek's Pathfinder
cards.text: {C}: Target creature can't block Kozilek's Pathfinder this turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.name: Matter Reshaper
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
When Matter Reshaper dies, reveal the top card of your library. You may put that card onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

cards.flavor: As easy to stop as it is to comprehend.
cards.name: Reality Smasher
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
Trample, haste
Whenever Reality Smasher becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, counter that spell unless its controller discards a card.

cards.flavor:
"For those without the Planeswalker spark, the merest touch of the Blind Eternities can kill."
—Ugin
cards.name: Spatial Contortion
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
Target creature gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Thought-Knot Seer
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
When Thought-Knot Seer enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
When Thought-Knot Seer leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.

cards.flavor: In the absence of life, something yet grows.
cards.name: Walker of the Wastes
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
Trample
Walker of the Wastes gets +1/+1 for each land you control named Wastes.

cards.flavor: The wastelands disorient even the most experienced scouts, making them easy prey for Kozilek's drones.
cards.name: Warden of Geometries
cards.text:
Vigilance
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.name: Warping Wail
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
Choose one —
• Exile target creature with power or toughness 1 or less.
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

cards.name: Eldrazi Displacer
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{2}{C}: Exile another target creature, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.flavor: "Through all the terrors we face, I hold on to the memory of the world before the Eldrazi came. I'd like to see that world again."
cards.name: Affa Protector
cards.text: Vigilance

cards.flavor: "Our formation was scattered after Sea Gate fell. If you're fighting the Eldrazi, consider us your newest recruits."
cards.name: Allied Reinforcements
cards.text: Create two 2/2 white Knight Ally creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
"I've heard it said that a Planeswalker is someone who can always run from danger. But Gideon's right: we're also the ones who can choose to stay."
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Call the Gatewatch
cards.text: Search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"The light of a felidar's horns can give even an Eldrazi pause."
—Zarra, lullmage
cards.name: Dazzling Reflection
cards.text: You gain life equal to target creature's power. The next time that creature would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Expedition Raptor
cards.text:
Flying
When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.name: General Tazri
cards.text:
When General Tazri enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Ally creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Ally creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of colors among those creatures.

cards.flavor:
"The sun can warm your skin or blister it, nurture your crops or wither them, light your path or blind you. She is a fickle friend, but a far worse enemy."
—Nazra of the Stone Havens
cards.name: Immolating Glare
cards.text: Destroy target attacking creature.

cards.flavor:
"Walk now in my light. When the rest of the world closes its eyes, you will still see."
—Iona
cards.name: Iona's Blessing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can block an additional creature each combat.

cards.flavor: When properly aligned, hedrons become powerful tools of binding.

cards.text: When Isolation Zone enters the battlefield, exile target creature or enchantment an opponent controls until Isolation Zone leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

cards.flavor: The kor of Zendikar are known for quiet determination in the face of overwhelming odds.
cards.name: Kor Scythemaster
cards.text: Kor Scythemaster has first strike as long as it's attacking.

cards.flavor: "With rope, I can fly as far as the rope can reach. But with light, the sky is the limit."

cards.text: {1}{W}: Kor Sky Climber gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Linvala, the Preserver
cards.text:
Flying
When Linvala, the Preserver enters the battlefield, if an opponent has more life than you, you gain 5 life.
When Linvala enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more creatures than you, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.

cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

cards.flavor: "The Eldrazi have surprised us before. It's my job to make sure that never happens again."

cards.flavor:
"We may have lost faith in our gods, but we are far from losing faith in ourselves."

cards.flavor: "Do not let yourselves fall now. Zendikar is depending on us—on you!"

cards.flavor: "For justice and peace, I will keep watch."

When Oath of Gideon enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Kor Ally creature tokens.

cards.flavor: "I will follow the light of Iona into battle, and I will know no fear."

cards.flavor:
"Light can lay bare our fears. It can also make them go away."

cards.flavor:
"Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight."

cards.name: Expedite
cards.text:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: As Gideon kept the brood lineages at bay, Chandra incinerated the bound Eldrazi titans.
cards.name: Fall of the Titans
cards.text:
Surge {X}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Fall of the Titans deals X damage to each of up to two targets.

cards.name: Goblin Dark-Dwellers
cards.text:
Menace
When Goblin Dark-Dwellers enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: There are old goblins and ambitious goblins, but very few old, ambitious goblins.
cards.name: Goblin Freerunner
cards.text:
Surge {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor: Travelers are advised to bring extra swords, preferably shiny ones.
cards.name: Kazuul's Toll Collector
cards.text: {0}: Attach target Equipment you control to Kazuul's Toll Collector. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor: "If it means that people can live in freedom, yeah, I'll keep watch."
cards.name: Oath of Chandra
cards.text:
When Oath of Chandra enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
At the beginning of each end step, if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Oath of Chandra deals 2 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Press into Service
cards.text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Never ask a pyromancer if that's the best she's got.
cards.name: Pyromancer's Assault
cards.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Pyromancer's Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.name: Reckless Bushwhacker
cards.text:
Surge {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Haste
When Reckless Bushwhacker enters the battlefield, if its surge cost was paid, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"A touch of lightning, and anyone can be taught to dance."
—Tobin, sparkmage
cards.name: Sparkmage's Gambit
cards.text: Sparkmage's Gambit deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: When Kozilek destroyed Sea Gate, distant Valakut could not contain its grief.
cards.name: Tears of Valakut
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Tears of Valakut deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.

cards.name: Tyrant of Valakut
cards.text:
Surge {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Flying
When Tyrant of Valakut enters the battlefield, if its surge cost was paid, it deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"There's a word for someone who brings too much gear to battle: 'survivor.'"
—Zada of Slab Haven
cards.name: Zada's Commando
cards.text:
First strike
Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Zada's Commando deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.name: Birthing Hulk
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Birthing Hulk enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}." ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{1}{C}: Regenerate Birthing Hulk.

cards.name: Ruin in Their Wake
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. You may put that card onto the battlefield tapped if you control a land named Wastes. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Scion Summoner
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Scion Summoner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}." ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.flavor: As the Eldrazi adapted to the jungles of Zendikar, some took on the tactics of more familiar predators.
cards.name: Stalking Drone
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}: Stalking Drone gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.name: Vile Redeemer
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flash
When you cast this spell, you may pay {C}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token for each nontoken creature that died under your control this turn. Those tokens have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

cards.name: World Breaker
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When you cast this spell, exile target artifact, enchantment, or land.
Reach
{2}{C}, Sacrifice a land: Return World Breaker from your graveyard to your hand. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.flavor: A young baloth channels its energy into playful destructiveness. Over time, it becomes less playful but no less destructive.
cards.name: Baloth Pup
cards.text: Baloth Pup has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: Jace discovered the leyline pattern needed to anchor Ulamog and Kozilek to reality, but it was Nissa who could trace it on her world.
cards.name: Bonds of Mortality
cards.text:
When Bonds of Mortality enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{G}: Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The settlement's defenders were glad to have such a massive, ferocious creature join the fight—but less glad to see it flatten their homes along the way.
cards.name: Canopy Gorger

cards.flavor:
"My heart and Zendikar's beat as one. Together we will endure."
—Nissa Revane
cards.name: Elemental Uprising
cards.text: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.

cards.name: Embodiment of Insight
cards.text:
Vigilance
Land creatures you control have vigilance.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target land you control become a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

cards.name: Gladehart Cavalry
cards.text:
When Gladehart Cavalry enters the battlefield, support 6. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.)
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Having no interest in the greater conflict, the trolls continue to prey upon whatever wanders into their domain.
cards.name: Harvester Troll
cards.text: When Harvester Troll enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or land. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Harvester Troll.

cards.flavor: Gideon and Nissa carved a path through the Eldrazi swarm, and their Zendikari allies charged into the fray behind them.
cards.name: Lead by Example
cards.text: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)

cards.flavor: The forest floor of Murasa is home to life as diverse and vibrant as that of the canopy above.
cards.name: Loam Larva
cards.text: When Loam Larva enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.flavor:
"Killing the Eldrazi is not enough. We must erase all memory of them from this world."
—Greenweaver Mina
cards.name: Natural State
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with converted mana cost 3 or less.

cards.flavor: In the jungles of Tazeem, aerial assault is not always advantageous.
cards.name: Netcaster Spider
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Nissa, Voice of Zendikar
cards.text:
+1: Create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
−2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
−7: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Nissa's Judgment
cards.text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Choose up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

cards.flavor: "For the life of every plane, I will keep watch."
cards.name: Oath of Nissa
cards.text:
When Oath of Nissa enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.

cards.flavor: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."
cards.name: Pulse of Murasa
cards.text: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

cards.flavor:
"A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one . . . well, it's a tasty dinner."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter
cards.name: Saddleback Lagac
cards.text: When Saddleback Lagac enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.flavor: It is a reminder that spring will always follow winter.
cards.name: Seed Guardian
cards.text:
Reach
When Seed Guardian dies, create an X/X green Elemental creature token, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "The land gives of itself. Its abundance provides, even in times of chaos."
cards.name: Sylvan Advocate
cards.text:
Vigilance
As long as you control six or more lands, Sylvan Advocate and land creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.flavor: "My people blazed these pathways long ago, before the Eldrazi came. We will ride them long after the Eldrazi are gone."
cards.name: Tajuru Pathwarden
cards.text: Vigilance, trample

cards.flavor: "The most elegant solutions are found in nature. You just have to know where to look."
cards.name: Vines of the Recluse
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

cards.name: Zendikar Resurgent
cards.text:
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. (The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.)
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Flayer Drone
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
First strike
Whenever another colorless creature enters the battlefield under your control, target opponent loses 1 life.

cards.name: Mindmelter
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Mindmelter can't be blocked.
{3}{C}: Target opponent exiles a card from their hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.name: Void Grafter
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Void Grafter enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.name: Ayli, Eternal Pilgrim
cards.text:
Deathtouch
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
{1}{W}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Exile target nonland permanent. Activate this ability only if you have at least 10 life more than your starting life total.

cards.flavor:
"Humans use pigs to hunt for mushrooms, don't they? It's like that."
—Harak, Malakir bloodwitch
cards.name: Baloth Null
cards.text: When Baloth Null enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "My people are no longer slaves to the Eldrazi, beholden to the past. We will determine our own future."
cards.name: Cliffhaven Vampire
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: "Before the battle, I heard them take an oath near the ruins of Sea Gate. I hope they inspire others to keep watch."
cards.name: Joraga Auxiliary
cards.text: {4}{G}{W}: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.flavor: "Some relic hunters have given up exploring and gone to fight the Eldrazi. But I know our work is more important than ever. The secrets we uncover could lead to the world's salvation."
cards.name: Jori En, Ruin Diver
cards.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Greenweaver Mina and her twin brother Denn lead the last of the Mul Daya into an uncertain future.
cards.name: Mina and Denn, Wildborn
cards.text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
{R}{G}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Reflector Mage
cards.text: When Reflector Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand. That creature's owner can't cast spells with the same name as that creature until your next turn.

cards.flavor: "I swore to take one head for each member of my family they killed. My task is nowhere near its end."
cards.name: Relentless Hunter
cards.text: {1}{R}{G}: Relentless Hunter gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Roilmages' tactics are as chaotic as the energies they channel.
cards.name: Stormchaser Mage
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: "When I'm done training you, anything will be a deadly weapon."
cards.name: Weapons Trainer
cards.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 as long as you control an Equipment.

cards.flavor: Once a simple tool, it—like everything else on Zendikar—has been turned into a weapon against the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Bone Saw
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Forged for victory in a time of despair.
cards.name: Captain's Claws

cards.flavor:
"If we're going to survive, we have to use every tool at our disposal. Especially the disgusting ones."
—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout
cards.name: Chitinous Cloak
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Equip {3}

cards.flavor:
"It's endearing, in a mystical, pointy sort of way."
—General Tazri, allied commander
cards.name: Hedron Crawler
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.flavor: A light to bring hope in dark times.
cards.name: Seer's Lantern
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{2}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: The nomadic kor carry only necessities on their long treks. The coming of the Eldrazi redefined "necessities."
cards.name: Stoneforge Masterwork
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control that shares a creature type with it.
Equip {2}

cards.flavor:
"Sometimes being fast is as important as being smart."
—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout
cards.name: Strider Harness
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: A mudflow swallowed the lowlands years ago. All that remains are a bottomless mire and an endless rain of ash.
cards.name: Cinder Barrens
cards.text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

cards.flavor:
"Look, and see the future."
—Ayli, high priest of the Eternal Pilgrims
cards.name: Corrupted Crossroads
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell with devoid.

cards.name: Crumbling Vestige
cards.text:
Crumbling Vestige enters the battlefield tapped.
When Crumbling Vestige enters the battlefield, add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

cards.text:
Hissing Quagmire enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{1}{B}{G}: Hissing Quagmire becomes a 2/2 black and green Elemental creature with deathtouch until end of turn. It's still a land.

cards.flavor: Even in areas of profound devastation, the hedrons remained intact.
cards.name: Holdout Settlement
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.
cards.name: Meandering River
cards.text:
Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.name: Mirrorpool
cards.text:
Mirrorpool enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}{C}, {T}, Sacrifice Mirrorpool: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{4}{C}, {T}, Sacrifice Mirrorpool: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.

cards.name: Needle Spires
cards.text:
Needle Spires enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{2}{R}{W}: Needle Spires becomes a 2/1 red and white Elemental creature with double strike until end of turn. It's still a land.

cards.name: Ruins of Oran-Rief
cards.text:
Ruins of Oran-Rief enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target colorless creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

cards.flavor: Once a center for knowledge, Sea Gate now serves as a reminder of what was lost.
cards.name: Sea Gate Wreckage
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{2}{C}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

cards.flavor:
"Long after the land has given up the last of its secrets, there will still be mysteries in the depths of the sea."
—Kiora
cards.name: Submerged Boneyard
cards.text:
Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

cards.flavor: Tazeem's embrace is harsh, but for those that call it home, nothing else will do.
cards.name: Timber Gorge
cards.text:
Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.flavor: Despite the chaos of the Roil and the devastation of the Eldrazi, Zendikar is a world of breathtaking beauty.
cards.name: Tranquil Expanse
cards.text:
Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

cards.flavor: Kozilek's presence warped the land, stripping away layer after layer.
cards.name: Unknown Shores
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
